reviews.review: Продолжение лучшей игры в истории человечества. Интересный и загадочный сюжет, который тянет вперёд до самых финальных титров и всё равно не даёт ответа и покоя. Потрясающе продуманные уровни, умные и разнообразные враги, великолепная физика, отличная даже по современным меркам картинка. Всё вместе создаёт потрясающую и увлекательную игру, которую можно проходить десятки и сотни раз и постоянно находить и открывать что-то новое для себя.
This is the best FPS to ever be made. It has an amazing story, and the graphics are amazing for a game made in 2004. If you have played the first one, I strongly recommend to buy this one.

I would buy this again if I could.  It was made nearly 10 years ago, and it still stands up pretty well against today's games.  Amazing.

After that, im not gonna tell you what happened, you can play it you'r self.  A lot of new enemies are here, beautiefal areas to explore, original puzzles to do to progress the game, the good 'old weapons from the prequel are here remastered with new ambilities and also, new weapons. Half-Life 2 is one of my all time favorites

What can be said about Half-Life 2 that hasn't already been said.  The game is a classic that should be played by any fan of FPS and/or action adventure games.  I've personally have beaten this game countless times and even with this new steam account, it was the first thing I bought because I knew I would want to play it again.  This PC version is king compared to the PS3 port I own of the Orange Box.  The reason this game is a classic is because at the time of release it was easily the best FPS on the market and shaped the way FPS was created from then on.  When playing it you felt like you were starring in an action film, but then again thats still true to this day even if other modern titles take that idea to a whole new level.  Riding in a boat or dune buggy in a FPS was brilliant at the time.  But even modern games causing this great title to age in comparison, none of the modern FPS titles stand out like HL2 stood out for years when it was released.  This game will forever be seen as one of the most important points/titles in the evolution of such a popular, and some what  diluted, genre.  This is on the level of Doom, Quake, and Bioshock as one of the most important FPS ever made.
One of the best games made by Valve, Good graphic , story and soundtracks...

poop

Clearly a product of its time. But for two amazingly fun  aspects, this would not be a game to recommend. 

The plot is essentially find NPC A, rescue NPC A, then rescue NPC A again, which wouldn't be bad if there were subplots to break it up. Instead it is essentially a shooter version of the first three levels of Super Mario Brothers that runs on for an agonizingly long time. 

I abhor vehicle stages, so it is no surprise that I loathed about 2/5 of this game, where you are forced to drive through. Although I was nearly driven to claw my eyes out over this, these sections are most assuredly a product of the time when the game was made, as vehicle stages were the in thing. 

The music, where nice, is sporadic and inconsistent. This makes it detract from the game play far more than it enhances it.

On the plus side, the overall visuals still hold up well. This isn't Mass Effect 3, but its still solid.

The thing that likely got the game the high marks that it did was the gravity gun, which, yes, was a lot of fun, especially when it finally gets supercharged. Even its lesser version is crazy good and opens possibilities for puzzles.

Controlling the antlions also proved amazing fun. It is minion madness at its best. This contrasts starkly to the obnoxious squad members you get later.

Overall the gravity gun and antlions make this game fun when they are at their peak, but when they aren't, the levels just seem to drone on and on.

This game is absolutely amazing. I feel that too many people over look this games true beauty because they only want it for the amazing mods that come with it. Although the mods for this game are fantastic, the game itself is a gem. Fresh off of the train to City 17 is Gordon Freeman, a physicist and survivor of the terrible events of Black Mesa. Freeman has been absent for years and has been dropped back into a world where the Combine, the alien menace from the first Half Life, has taken control of the earth and has began opressing its people. Gordon Freeman must liberate the earth and save the day yet again. This game was truly an experiance to play and felt like more of a story. The way that characters express their emotions not only through dialogue but facial expressions is truly remarkable. Also Gordon Freeman has the best voice actor ever.

A thrill a minute for the most part. About the only thing bad are the box stacking puzzles and the frequent "Loading" interruptions. An example of what video games should be. Perfect score of five stars.
Que buen juego, ojala salga el 3
This is an amazing game, with a strong story and easy to learn controls. I definetly recomend this game
Such an amazing game for its time, and amazing graphics and gameplay
Simplemente genial. Podría decir que es el mejor juego que he jugado en mi vida.

Buenísimo, y ya. Aquí donde le veis Half Life 2 tiene ya casi 10 años, y aún luce increiblemente bien gráficamente. Basta con fijarse en las expresiones faciales de los personajes para ver que era un pepino gráfico cuando salió. El gunplay es divertidísmo, mucho mejor que el de su antecesor, el cual aunque es un juegazo también, tiene una jugabilidad un poco anticuada (movimientos demasiado rápidos sobre todo) La ambientación es muy buena, y además variada, desde canales y carreteras hasta ciudades en guerra civil y pueblos arrasados por zombies. Esto conlleva a la gran variedad de situaciones que hay, ya que podemos conducir una lancha y un coche, luego tenemos survival horror, tenemos también shooter más táctico, donde podemos controlar escuadrones de rebeldes, etc. La banda sonora está guay, y la trama argumental bastante bien llevada a través de la narrativa visual, aunque te deja con más preguntas que respuestas. En fin, estáis tardando en jugarlo.

this game is fun. youre a man named doctor Gorman Freeman going on a adventure fighting monsters and police men.Further into the game you get awesome weapons such as the GRAVITY GUN.the power of gravity is in your hands once you get this gun.

Half-Life 2 est tout simplement le meilleure jeu auquel j'ai jouer, élue meilleurs jeu de la décénnie par PC Gamer.
L'histoire est passionante et se déroule dans un univers de SF manifique. Le moteur source, quoi qu'on en dise, est parfaitement adapter au jeu, ses graphismes sont assez moches comparer au jeu "modernes" et sa jouabilitée (gameplay) et assez pauvre. Mais cela n'affecte pas le plaisir de jeu. Le Level designe est trés bien conçue et d'aprés les commentaires des dévelloppeures rassemble de nombreux procéder propres au cinéma.

En conclusion: c'est un jeu passionnant dont vous ne pourrais vous détacher avant de l'avoir entiérement fini !

You can't call yourself a gamerr until you've played through a Half Life game at least once.  Since we're not likely to see a Glaf Life 3 anytime soon this is your best bet.  At this point it's a cult classic with dated graphics but it's a good introduction to the FPS/RPG genre.

For me this is easily the best game in steam if not even the best game in existance. The story line is just unbelievably well done once you get into it, they graphics are just like any other common source game. Plus you get to do lots of fun things like driving  boats, cars, and blowing thigs up. A very diverse game when it comes to the atmosphere given off in the levels. If you enjoy quality story games, then try this one. You might just fall in love with it as i have. And if this one is to your liking, they try out Episode 1 & 2; Hl2's sequels.
Simply put, this game is a classic. The story may not be the most original but its told with a finesse which is rarely seen in games even now. This should be in every gamers collection

Данная игра не зря считается одной из лучших игр в мире, по-этому не поиграть в неё было бы преступлением. Прошло чуть меньше 10 лет, с момента её выхода, но играя в Half-Life 2 ты и сейчас получаешь огромное удовольствие. Вторая часть, к счастью не так затянута как первая, и проходиться на одном дыхании. Конечно же можно немного позаморачиваться получая разнообразные достижения, но даже это не затягивает игру и вы не устаете. Огромный плюс это разнообразие локаций, интересный геймплей, захватывающий сюжет, а концовка... это просто шедевр!!! По-этому всем рекомендую данную игру, это 5/5!

Buenisimo el juego. La accion y la intensidad se la vive a todo momento. La historia la dejan super abierta y dan ganas de seguir jugando el otro, exactamente cuando termina uno. Hay un par de partes tensas en las que estar solo y el haber zombies en todas partes puede ser que te complique un poco las cosas como en el capitulo "Nos vamos a Ravenholm...". La aparicion de los Combine esta muy buena porque no solo tenes que luchar contra los aliens como los Vortigaunts o los Headcrab sino que hay un par de "soldaditos" malos que tenes que descargarle cartucho. Tambien aparecen personajes "nuevos" como Eli Vance y su hija Alyx. Bueno no quiero spoilear mas n.n espero que sea de su agrado y gasten cuanto gasten este juego vale muucho la pena.
PD: Les combiene por lejos comprar "The Orange Box" que contiene el Half Life 2 y sus dos episodios
Pretty good.

Do not consider yourself a gamer untill you've played this. Arguably one of the greatest PC Games ever. It revolutionised gaming and did a great job at showing off amazing graphics for its release in late 2004. No cutscenes that come between you and the game, making the player feel that much more immersed. Once you've played this game make sure to play HL2 E1 and E2.
I also recommend purchasing the first Half Life aswell as its spin off games Half Life Blue Shift and Half Life Opposing force.

This is quite easily the best fps that I've ever played. The graphics hold up to today's standards, the music stays in your head, every level is memorable, etc. What gets me the most is how on one level, you can feel like a complete bamf, and on the next level (Ravenholm), you can feel like a complete coward. Overall, this game easily takes it's place in my top 10 games of all time.
